15.1.hd_quote: The love of humanity can only exist when all of the extremes are permitted.
15.1.behavioral_axis: Accepts any place within the spectrum of extremes without expectations, seeking relationships that honor natural rhythm.
15.1.shadow_axis: Becomes alienated through exaggerated claims about extreme nature, disturbed when others interfere with rhythm.
15.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

15.2.hd_quote: Right action is to follow one's extreme.
15.2.behavioral_axis: Naturally embodies extreme rhythms without knowing it, called out by others who recognize the extremism in the aura.
15.2.shadow_axis: Uses extreme nature to influence and manipulate others through contrived rather than natural extremism.
15.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

15.3.hd_quote: The confusion is between what is natural and comes to us choicelessly and what the ego claims to be its own.
15.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments with extreme rhythms through trial and error, discovering which extremes are natural versus strategic adaptations.
15.3.shadow_axis: Controls extreme behavior as protective strategy, relying on one conditioned extreme rather than flowing through natural rhythm.
15.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

15.4.hd_quote: These people feel inadequate because all they can ever do is externalize their extreme.
15.4.behavioral_axis: Externalizes fixed extreme rhythm into networks and relationships, seeking environments where that extreme fits into the flow.
15.4.shadow_axis: Feels deeply inadequate and out of place when extreme doesn't match environment, experiencing humiliation from exposure.
15.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

15.5.hd_quote: The ability to sense when otherwise balanced behavior must be adjusted to meet the requirements of a changing environment.
15.5.behavioral_axis: Holds projection field that draws others into rhythms, adjusting extreme expression when the right moment in changed environment genuinely calls for it.
15.5.shadow_axis: Overcompensates by swinging between extremes to satisfy conditioning demands, disturbing natural flow and performing the role for projections.
15.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

15.6.hd_quote: Modesty that is never confused with weakness.
15.6.behavioral_axis: Withdraws to the roof early in life with objectivity, thinking before speaking and waiting to express extreme nature at the right moment.
15.6.shadow_axis: Uses harmony as weapon in problem situations rather than focusing on root causes, ignoring weakness in favor of superficial peace.
15.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
